title: Low Quality Attachment is Agapic Failure - Vervaeke #16, Agape, Attachment Theory & Dynamic Quality
description:
Reaction to Vervaeke 16, Agape through the lens of attachment theory. Referencing the great DW Winnicott, the mother-child dyad, mirroring and other concepts. How does all this relate to MOQ?

I am pretty sure that this is the video that I remember from School. Not Romanian, so I was mistaken.  Absolutely heartbreaking, so trigger warning:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VvdOe10vrs4

Wikipage for Winicott:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donald_Winnicott

Here's the definition of Attachment from Psychology Today:
https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/basics/attachment
